trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZE013_05131_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> After all that traipsing around the desert, you finally have the chance to do something heroic.
TEXT_KINGZE013_05131_TODO_00<tab>Search for the girl's brother and defeat the yeheheceyaa.
TEXT_KINGZE013_05131_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the strapping young lad.
TEXT_KINGZE013_05131_SISTER05131_000_001<tab>Me and my brother were cloudfishing, and we were attacked by a yeheheceyaa! He told me to run, so I did, but he stayed behind to fight it!
TEXT_KINGZE013_05131_SISTER05131_000_002<tab>He's still down by the cliffs, and if you hurry, you'll make it in time! You'll go help him, won't you?
TEXT_KINGZE013_05131_BROTHER05131_000_020<tab>Thank you... If you hadn't turned up when you did, I'd be a goner for sure!
TEXT_KINGZE013_05131_BROTHER05131_000_021<tab>I'd better go let my sister know I'm all right. Besides, it ain't safe here, so I suggest you head back to town as well. Maybe I'll see you there?
TEXT_KINGZE013_05131_SISTER05131_000_020<tab>You did it! My brother's alive, and it's all because of you!
TEXT_KINGZE013_05131_BROTHER05131_000_030<tab>Good to see you again. So my sister is the one who sent you to rescue me? Looks like I owe my life to both of you!

TEXT_KINGZE013_05131_BROTHER05131_000_031<tab>Truth be told, a yeheheceyaa is the last thing I expected to see, never mind being attacked by one. They must've expanded their territory or something, so I'd better stay away from the cliff tops for a while.

TEXT_KINGZE013_05131_BROTHER05131_000_032<tab>That said, we make our living off the creatures we catch there, so we can't give up on cloudfishing altogether. I suppose the nearest safe spot would be somewhere near the bridge to Tuliyollal, which is kind of far from here... Still, better than no fishing at all!
TEXT_KINGZE013_05131_BROTHER05131_000_033<tab>Speaking of which, it's time to go snag us some more fish! Thanks again, friend. Stay safe out there, you hear?
